description:
Character with a lot of movement and animation cancellations.

Her 'strongest team' in terms of damage—Mono Pyro—is also the easiest to play, letting you to concentrate on this skill expression.

Charged Attacks deal a lot of poise damage, allowing you to juggle/stun adversaries.

Because stunlocked foes are unable to attack Klee, shields are not required.

Buffs for Elemental Skill and Burst snapshots.
Off-field damage may be dealt using Elemental Skill.
title: Klee | Playstyle
